member.name: M:Task1.Population.GetYears(System.Int32,System.Double,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: This method counts how many years passed before initial population reached current value.
member.param: By how many percents initial population increases.
How many new inhabitants have come.
member.returns: How many years passed before initial population reached current value.
member.exception: In case amount of people is less or equals zero.
If percentage is below zero or above 100.
